entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.0°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy and 60 percent chance of flurries or ice pellets late in the morning and in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning and afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
